bergbreaker.effect: Ground Stomp creates a ring of spikes that deal 75% weapon damage

bonegyre.effect: Whirlwind launches bone projectiles that deal 25% weapon damage

broken_tusk.effect: Furious Charge leaves behind a trail of spikes dealing 50% weapon damage

cut_to_the_bone.effect: Cleave's Bleed damage is increased by 50% against Stunned or Immobilized enemies

deathblow.effect: Cleave has a 15% chance to instantly kill enemies below 10% Life

earthstriker_aspect.effect: Ground Stomp's radius is increased by 25%

edgewalker.effect: Whirlwind gains 5% increased damage for each second spent spinning

fresh_whirl.effect: Whirlwind's damage is increased by 30% for the first 2 seconds after casting

galesong.effect: Whirlwind increases your Movement Speed by 15% while active

goreseeker.effect: Cleave causes enemies to explode for 75% weapon damage when they die while Bleeding

hammer_of_the_ancients_aspect.effect: Hammer of the Ancients has a 25% chance to create a shockwave

mighty_slam.effect: Ground Stomp's damage is increased by 40% but its cooldown is increased by 2s

oathkeeper.effect: War Cry grants a shield absorbing damage equal to 20% of your maximum Life

perpetual_charge.effect: Furious Charge's cooldown is reduced by 0.5s for each enemy hit

rage_of_harrogath_aspect.effect: While Berserking, your Critical Strike Damage is increased by 25%

relentless_fury.effect: Frenzy's Attack Speed bonus is increased by 10%

roar_of_persuasion.effect: Thirsting Berserker: Wrath of the Berserker no longer increases Attack and Movement Speed, instead it now increases Critical Hit Damage and gives you Life Drain. Wrath of the Berserker Cooldown Reduced by 7.2%

slaking_aspect.effect: Sprint generates 5 Fury per second while active

the_butchers_cleaver_aspect.effect: Cleave has a 15% chance to hit twice

the_last_wail.effect: War Cry deals 100% weapon damage to nearby enemies

thunderstrike.effect: Ground Stomp has a 25% chance to call down lightning dealing 150% weapon damage

upheaval.effect: Ground Stomp launches enemies into the air

wind_striker.effect: Sprint leaves behind a trail of wind that increases ally Movement Speed by 15%
